bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of inadvertent gnawing on the tip of one’s own tongue. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 26: 病發時嗇 嗇惡寒，頭微痛，乾嘔，背迫急，口噤不覺，嚼舌，大小便秘澀 , “When the disease develops, one shivers and has an aversion to cold. There is a mild headache, associated with dry vomiting. The back is tight, the jaws are clenchedand [the patient] loses consciousness. [Patients] chew their tongue ; defecation and urination are impaired and rough”.
